page.title: 03LAW AND ORDER,NE Sut.C'field
page.content: The maintenance of law and order is a social concern. Middle-aged and older residents are very anxious that elements of teenagers are making a nuisance of themselves on the streets and in the shopping areas in a manner which is aggressive and hostile towards ordinary residents. This may partly be an attitude of the older generation towards the younger but is also an acknowledgement that people do not feel as Â£safe' in the 1980's because crime is on the increase. Numbers of burglaries have increased andoffences associated with motoring are commonplace. Sutton Coldfield police station recorded the driver with the highest alcoholic intake in the whole of Birmingham. The ready availability of alcohol is abused by teenagers. People want more policemen.
